Title: Account Now PrePay & Past Due Notice
Subject Line: Urgent Action Required: Past Due Invoices & Account Status Update
Content:
We've reached out multiple times regarding your past due invoices, and you've previously assured us that payment would be made. However, as of today, these invoices remain unpaid.

Please be advised that all past due invoices must be paid in full by June 20th. Failure to meet this deadline will result in us taking additional actions to resolve the outstanding balance.

Due to the continued past due balances, your account has been moved to prepay status. Your online store has been updated to require a credit card payment at checkout. Going forward, no orders will be processed without full payment at the time of purchase.

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or need a copy of your outstanding invoices, please let us know.
